articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Combined Strike Drill of KPA Three Services
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Combined Strike Drill of KPA Three Services 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, guided a combined strike drill of the three services of the KPA. 
					 Present at the observation deck in the drill ground to greet him were KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk and Kim Won Hong.
					
					 KPA Generals Pak Jae Gyong, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol and Kim Yong Chol, staff members of the KPA Supreme Command and commanding officers of KPA large combined units were waiting for him on the spot.
					
					 Among the observers of the drill were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk and Kim Chang Sop, senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, members of the leading organs of the WPK Central Committee in Pyongyang and officials of ministries and national institutions and in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health, media and defence industry.
					
					  Kim Jong Un received a salute from the chief of the General Staff of the KPA before mounting the observation deck.
					
					 After hearing a detailed explanation about the program of the drill and distribution of striking units, he issued an order to start the drill.
					
					 Nose diving flying corps and warships of the KPA Navy making their ways through rough waters hit their targets and artillery pieces in their positions ridden with powder smoke dealt deadly blows at the "group of enemy warships" with volleys of fire.
					
					 Greatly pleased to watch the valiant and resourceful aviation of pilots conducting contour flight, zooming and various upturns, he appreciated their successful drill.
					
					 He put forth highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He instructed the officers and men of the three services to think of battle fields at all times, whether they are in sleep or in dreams, adding that they should always keep themselves on such maximum alert as they are just before opening fire, deeply aware of the sacred responsibility to defend the country.
					
					 The KPA service personnel ready to return fire for fire are filled with the will to deal merciless and deadly blows at the aggressors who provoke the DPRK even a bit, he said, ordering them to mercilessly wipe out the enemies with arms of justice and revenge once they go into action.
					
					 A fight never starts after an ad is made and the enemies are watching for a chance to make a surprise attack, he noted, instructing the whole army to defend the sky, land and seas of the socialist country as firm as an iron wall while watching every movement of the enemies with vigilance.
					
					 Our socialist system centered on the popular masses will shine forever as an invulnerable fortress as it is guarded by the heroic KPA, a strong elite army built under the care of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 He expressed belief that the KPA service personnel would firmly protect the security of the country and the happiness of its people by force of arms.

articles.title: S. Korea, Hotbed of Nuclear Proliferation and Source of Nuclear War: KANPC
articles.content:
S. Korea, Hotbed of Nuclear Proliferation and Source of Nuclear War: KANPC
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Anti-Nuke Peace Committee Wednesday released a white paper to disclose the crimes the U.S. and south Korean authorities perpetrated by turning south Korea into the world's worst hotbed of nuclear proliferation, fraught with the biggest danger of a nuclear war.
					 The white paper, released in connection with the "Nuclear Security Summit" to be held in south Korea on March 26 and 27, said:
					
					 Nukes have been shipped into south Korea since 1950.
					
					 From late in the 1950s the U.S. has shipped into south Korea Honest John tactical nuclear missiles, 280mm atomic artillery pieces, "B-61" nuclear bombs, etc. nonstop.
					
					 The U.S. shipment and deployment of nuclear weapons in south Korea steadily increased, bringing their number to over 1,000 in the 1970s and at least 1,720 in the 1990s. South Korea tops the world list in the density of their deployment.
					
					 The "map on the nuclear shipment and deployment by U.S. forces in south Korea" submitted to the south Korean puppet "National Assembly" on October 9, 2005 says that nukes are stockpiled not only in Chunchon, south Korean Kangwon Province, Osan of Kyonggi Province but also in Seoul, Taejon, Pusan, Taegu, Kwangju and other main cities. 
					
					 A confidential document of the U.S. forces declassified in December 2010 says that nukes had been deployed in the U.S. military base in Chunchon until April 2005. 
					
					 There is a nuclear arsenal extending 8km underground called "farm" in the U.S. military base in Kunsan of North Jolla Province and similar "farms" are still under construction one after another. 
					
					 The U.S. has stockpiled 2.74 millions depleted uranium bombs in its military bases in Suwon and Osan of Kyonggi Province, Chongju of North Chungchong Province and other parts of south Korea. This is 3.5 times the number of depleted uranium bombs used by the U.S. Air Force during the Gulfs War in 1991. 
					
					 South Korea also serves as a nuclear weapons arsenal for the U.S. forces. 
					
					 The U.S. has staged various war exercises for invading the north in south Korea since late in the 1950s, massively bringing a lot of nuclear attack means including super-large nuclear carriers, aegis cruisers and nuclear submarines. 
					
					 The U.S. introduced into south Korea "F-15E" and "F-16" nuclear-capable fighter bombers every year in the form of rotation deployment. In last December and January this year it additionally introduced 24 fighter bombers "F-16CM" and "F-16C" into its base in Kunsan.
					
					 The white paper notes that south Korea is the area where nuclear control is most fragile, adding that the U.S. is conniving at south Korean puppet forces' development of nuclear weapons, though it is aware of it. 
					
					 The U.S. also shuts its eyes to the south Korean puppet forces' extraction of fuel for nuclear weapons.
					
					 There were traces of extracting plutonium from nuclear reactors in south Korea in 1998 and 2003, but the U.S. pretended ignorance of the fact and covered it up.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have systematically stockpiled the spent fuel from the reactors underwater, keeping as many as 5 982 metric tons in December 2002.
					
					 This amount is enough to extract 36 metric tons of weapon-grade plutonium and is sufficient to produce at least 3,000 A-bombs similar to the one dropped over Nagasaki of Japan.
					
					 The U.S. is zealously backing south Korea not only in producing nuclear fuel but in acquiring the technology of manufacturing nukes.
					
					 It let an American company to conclude a contract with south Korea on the introduction of the technology of fast breeder reactor and provide help to it in 1982 while the Combustion Engineering Corporation delivered to it 201 pieces of technical data on designing, mock test and development of A-bombs.
					
					 The U.S. is also helping south Korea have access to nuclear delivery means.
					
					 It delivered nuclear-capable "Honest John", "Nike Hercules" and "Hawk" missiles to the puppet army in the 1970s. It also signed an "agreement on missiles" with south Korea in 1979, paving the way for developing missiles. 
					
					 Nuclear experts of south Korea blustered that it is the tenth in the world in the capability to manufacture nuclear weapons: three months are enough to produce one nuclear weapon and the technology of extracting enriched uranium has reached "the world's level".
					
					 South Korea is the most dangerous source of a nuclear war, the white paper points out, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is the most dangerous region in the world as the U.S. had already designated it as the next target of nuclear strike since it dropped A-bombs in Hiroshima and Nagasaki and its plan remains unchanged.
					
					 South Korea serves as an advance base for carrying out the U.S. scenario for the next nuclear war.
					
					 The then U.S. President Truman said at a news conference in November 1950 that the use of A-bombs in the Korean war was under earnest examination. The then Commander of the U.S Forces in the Far East MacArthur in December 1950 blackmailed the DPRK with nukes, saying the U.S. was planning to drop 30-50 A-bombs in the areas of the north bordering on China.
					
					 The U.S. examined its nuclear attack on the DPRK when its armed spy ship "Pueblo" was captured in January 1968 while illegally intruding into the DPRK's territorial waters and when its spy plane EC-121 was shot down in April 1969.
					
					 The U.S. moves to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK got evermore undisguised through Team Spirit joint military exercises staged by the U.S. with the puppet army of south Korea every year since 1976.
					
					 In the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework concluded in Geneva in October 1994 the U.S. committed itself to end its nuclear blackmail against the DPRK but it went ahead with drills for nuclear attack in the subsequent period, too.
					
					  The danger of the U.S. provocation of a nuclear war against the DPRK has become more potential since the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors came to power.
					
					 If such nuclear war-maniacs host what it called "Nuclear Security Summit", it will turn out to be no more than a confab for justifying their moves to launch a nuclear war and hurling the U.S. allies into the another Korean war in contingency, concludes the white paper.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Austrian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Austrian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Josef Muellner, Austrian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Vow to Wipe out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings are taking place at various agricultural units in the DPRK at which agricultural workers vow to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors through a merciless sacred war as it hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches at the meetings.
					
					 The speakers expressed their towering resentment at those traitors and military hooligans who are behaving in a provocative manner, far from making an apology for their hideous provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 They said:
					
					 The above-said dastardly acts are thrice-cursed crimes against the nation and ethics. We, therefore, can never pardon those cruel gangsters and warmongers for their thrice-cursed high treason.
					
					The party, army and people are united single-mindedly around the leader. This is the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 The agricultural workers, who regard it as their unshakable faith and a fundamental requirement for their lives to devotedly defend the leader, will intensify the drive for boosting the agricultural production in the spirit of showering fire on the enemies and turn out as one in a just sacred war if an order is issued.

articles.title: New Novel Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Novel Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A full-length novel "Mt. Osong" was created in the DPRK recently.
					 The novel, part of a cycle of novels "Immortal Guidance", depicts immortal exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed by frustrating all sorts of challenges by the imperialists and reactionaries and firmly defending socialism.
					
					 The novel is set against the background of the period from late in the 1990s to the beginning of the new century when the DPRK underwent stern trials.
					
					 Kim Jong Il climbed Mt. Osong in August Juche 87 (1998) with his unshakable will to build a thriving nation on this land, firmly sticking to Songun as a treasured sword for sure victory.
					
					 The novel portrays the brilliant commander of Songun who reached a height on the foremost front by making a journey along a steep mountain pass of 151 turns with sharp cliffs and deep valleys below them and instilled conviction of victory into servicepersons of the Korean People's Army standing guard over the outposts of socialism.
					
					 It tells about the leader who recollected the period of the Arduous March, forced march, noting that he could defend the country thanks to the Songun politics and Mt. Osong, a symbol of Songun.
					
					 The novel is run through with the idea that the victory in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation was the fruition of his unique Songun politics, extraordinary strategy and outstanding leadership art.

articles.title: New Internet Homepage Opened in DPRK
articles.content:
New Internet Homepage Opened in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Association of Cooks has opened "Korean Dishes", an Internet homepage.
					 The homepage deals with common knowledge and theories on variety of dishes and how to cook them.
					
					 It also offers such data as origins and anecdotes about dishes and global trend in cooking development.
					
					 It has a distinctive catalogue for serving housewives' convenience. When a visitor chooses any food material in the catalogue, she can get detailed information about lists of dishes prepared with it and their cookery.
					
					 The homepage contains multimedia on national and foreign dishes. Through homepage visitors can exchange their knowledge and views with each other and acquire a wide-ranging cooking.
					
					 An official of the Korean Association of Cooks told KCNA that this homepage serves as a close companion for cooks and housewives.

articles.title: Chae Jong Bo, Hero of DPRK
articles.content:
Chae Jong Bo, Hero of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un visited a ship named after Hero Chae Jong Bo during his recent military inspection.
					 Chae was an officer of the KPA Navy who performed feats in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					 Before the liberation of the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, Chae had suffered all sorts of hard toil at a shipping company run by them. 
					
					 After the country's liberation, he joined the KPA in Juche 36 (1947). When the Korean War broke out in June 1950, he ensured transport of mines in a responsible manner despite of heavy shelling and bombing by the enemy warships and planes.
					
					 He destroyed more than 10 enemy warships through successful mine-laying operations, thus contributing to foiling the enemies' maritime operations.
					
					 During the days of the KPA's temporary strategic retreat, he fought fierce battles to kill or injure hundreds of enemies while going up toward the north after disposing of the combat technical equipment.
					
					 He died of heavy injuries, after telling his comrades-in-arms to go to the KPA Supreme Command. 
					
					 The DPRK government awarded him the title of Hero of the Republic in April 1951.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses Remarks of U.S. Military Warmonger as Sheer Sophism
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses Remarks of U.S. Military Warmonger as Sheer Sophism
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- On February 28 Robert Willard, the then commander-in-Chief of the U.S. Forces in the Pacific, in his written speech presented to the Congress described the DPRK as "forces of threat". He claimed the DPRK's development of nuclear weapons and ballistic missiles makes it more urgent for the U.S. to establish a ballistic missile defence system and that the DPRK is threatening not only the U.S. and its allies but peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					 Minju Joson observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is the trigger-happy forces of the U.S. military that have perpetrated acts of threatening peace and security in Northeast Asia and are working hard to justify those acts by labeling the DPRK as "forces of threat." 
					
					 As clearly evidenced by the north-targeted joint military exercises going on in south Korea, it is none other than the U.S. which is the arch criminal posing a threat to peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. talk about "threat" from the DPRK is nothing but sheer sophism as it reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The U.S. is busy implementing its Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression. It is the strategic goal of the U.S. to put the whole of the Korean Peninsula under its control with south Korea as its base and, furthermore, establish its military domination over Northeast Asia and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. policy of permanent occupation of south Korea and its moves for a war of aggression are strongly protested at home and abroad. It is now keen to find pretexts for escaping this criticism and reinforcing its military presence in south Korea and military domination over Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. had better feel its responsibility as a harasser of peace and security in Northeast Asia and behave itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Arms of Mt. Paektu Guarantee Rosy Future of Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Arms of Mt. Paektu Guarantee Rosy Future of Thriving Nation
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Arms of the DPRK serve as a powerful weapon for class struggle against imperialism and a banner of victory in the effort for building a thriving socialist nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Powerful military might is a treasured sword for firmly defending socialism of Juche and glorifying it forever, notes the article, and goes on:
					
					 Strong arms will make it possible to defend socialism and achieve independent development of the country no matter what enemies may come in attack en masse and how many times the world may change.
					
					 Today Korean-style socialism is demonstrating its dignity and might thanks to the Songun leadership of the great Party. Countries and people aspiring after independence are now unanimous in saying that socialist Korea serves as a beacon of hope for progressive mankind as it has powerful capacities for national defence. This clearly proves the validity and vitality of the ideas of the Workers' Party of Korea on giving importance to the military affairs.
					
					 No one on earth can ever break the faith of the DPRK army and people who are resolved to turn the country, the homeland of Juche, President Kim Il Sung liberated and general secretary Kim Jong Il glorified into an invincible power, under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The powerful military strength is behind the great army-people unity, source of constant victories of the DPRK, as well as leaping progress in building a thriving nation.
					
					 It is an unshakable will of the WPK to accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche started with arms, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Lee Myung Bak Group as First Target to Be Wiped Out
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Lee Myung Bak Group as First Target to Be Wiped Out
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea seeking confrontation and war against fellow countrymen in the north is the first target of the Korean nation to be wiped out at an early date, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present conservative regime of south Korea is a heinous group of traitors escalating confrontation with compatriots and plunging the north-south relations into complete deadlock.
					
					 The group, antagonistic to compatriots in the north, has been engrossed in a sinister nuclear racket and smear campaign against the north over "human rights" in collusion with outside forces. It is busying itself, discussing the issue of "unification tax" and mapping out "unification constitution", obsessed by a daydream of "contingency" in the north. This resulted in aggravating the confrontation between the differing social systems.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is making desperate efforts in the smear campaign against the DPRK without a word of apology for its hideous crimes, while pledging "revenge". This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" and clearly proves that it is a group of gangsters out of reason. 
					
					 The regime has escalated the military confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula to the extremes while going against the aspiration of compatriots after the peace and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The Lee group has become more desperate in escalating the confrontation between the north and the south of Korea and intensifying war preparations against the north in a bid to prolong its remaining days. The situation on the Peninsula has thus reached the lowest ebb and the destiny of the nation has been seriously jeopardized. To preserve the peace of the country and the security of the nation, it is necessary to wipe out the Lee group.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun S. Korean Saenuri Party's Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship Blasted
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun S. Korean Saenuri Party's Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship Blasted 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The gentry of south Korea's Saenuri Party are eulogizing the "Yusin" dictator, sparking public anger, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 This is a blatant challenge to the south Koreans' desire for independence, democracy and reunification, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Traitor Park Chung-hee who seized power at gunpoint backed by the U.S. earned an ill fame as a matchless fascist executor.
					
					 He was engrossed in acts of treachery while brandishing the fascist stick as a means for suppressing the people who stood for independence, democracy and reunification until he was shot to death by his close confidant.
					
					 The cursed history of treachery should never be allowed to repeat itself. This is a desire of the south Koreans.
					
					 The desire has now been seriously mocked by the acts of treachery on the side of the Saenuri Party.
					
					 The party is like a poisonous mushroom that grew from the roots of "Yusin" dictatorship. The clan is now calling for "reform" and "change" while blaming their crimes on traitor Lee Myung Bak who is more dead than alive.
					
					 The revival of "Yusin" dictatorship will turn the clock of history back to the medieval dark age.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean conservative group may try to distort history and whitewash it, it can never erase the bitter lesson enshrined in the minds of the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Reorganization of U.S. Forces in Japan Aims at Invasion of  Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Reorganization of U.S. Forces in Japan Aims at Invasion of Korea
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. and Japan confirmed the basic policy of reorganizing the U.S. forces in Japan which envisages the maintenance of ten thousand U.S. Marines in Okinawa, Japan.
					 The policy outlines the transfer of the U.S. Marines to Guam Island as a priority step and the gradual follow-up relocation of the Futenma U.S. air force base inside the Okinawa Prefecture. The U.S. seeks to use the rest of its Marines in Okinawa in a cyclic way after deploying them in other Asian regions including south Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article observes in this regard:
					
					 The confirmation of the basic policy is a proof that the U.S. Asia-Pacific strategy has entered the phase of practical implementation.
					
					 Citing the theory of "Pacific State", the U.S. is thinking of giving stronger impact on the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 It regards the establishment of its domination in Northeast Asia as the core in its Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 The U.S. gives top priority to the Korean Peninsula because it thinks it can realize its ambition of dominating the continent of Eurasia and, furthermore, the whole world only when it occupies the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. has thus directed its efforts to tightening the military alliance with Japan rich in the experience of war of aggression, and south Korea, its lackey.
					
					 The U.S. attempts to use Guam Island and Okinawa as strongholds for fighting a war against the DPRK in case of "emergency" on the Korean Peninsula. Its ulterior aim is to amass aggression forces in areas close to the Korean Peninsula and use them in the second Korean War.
					
					 The U.S., giving priority to Japan's role in carrying out its strategy toward the Asia-Pacific region, is giving a shot in the arm of Japan, which is mired in serious political crisis.
					
					 With south Korea as a military strategic stronghold the U.S. seeks to attack the DPRK and dominate by force the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The coiled up tension on the Korean Peninsula will result in the escalation of tension in the Asia-Pacific region while the increasing danger of war on the Peninsula in the mounting danger of war in the region.

articles.title: March Issue of Bulletin Thongil Issued by Overseas Koreans' Organization
articles.content:
March Issue of Bulletin Thongil Issued by Overseas Koreans' Organization
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) released the March issue of bulletin Thongil.
					 The bulletin in a commemoration column for the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung carried an editorial the secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union contributed to the Russian paper Glasnosti.
					
					 The President authored lots of historic works to consolidate Korean style socialism, the editorial said, adding: Though the reactionaries loudly talk about the extinction of socialism on the planet, the DPRK is still standing as a model of socialism.
					
					 The bulletin carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the WPK and the DPRK people.
					
					 It carried a special write-up with the news about Kim Jong Un's inspection of units under the 4th Corps Command of the KPA in the southwestern forefront area and Unit 123 of KPA Navy honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					
					 It also carried statements released by the spokesmen for the KPA Supreme Command and for the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs to condemn the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for hurting the supreme leadership of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces to Stage War Drills in Areas along MDL
articles.content:
S. Korea to Stage War Drills in Areas along MDL
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The 25th division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage large-scale coordinated exercises in Phaju, Ryonchon, Yangju of Kyonggi Province and other areas along the Military Demarcation Line from Mar. 14 to 16, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Huge armed forces and offensive military hardware will be reportedly involved in the war drills to be staged under the simulated conditions of coping with some forces' infiltrations into areas on the forefront.
					
					 It is also said that the 1st division of the south Korean puppet army will stage a coordinated war drill in Phaju simultaneously with even civilians, police forces and administrative officials involved.

articles.title: Dangerous War Exercises against DPRK Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dangerous War Exercises against DPRK Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Veterans of the reunification movement organizations in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on March 9 to denounce the war exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces to invade the north.
					 Speakers at the rally said it is illogical for the warmongers to talk about defense after pouring a lot of ultra modern military equipment and hundreds of thousands of troops into Foal Eagle joint military exercise.
					
					 Ssangryong joint military exercise to be started from late March is apparently a war exercise for aggression in view of its scale and nature, they added.
					
					 The warmongers have increased the number of troops in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and staged shelling exercises every day, creating a touch-and-go situation on this land, they deplored.
					
					 They expressed their towering wrath at the Lee Myung Bak "government" which has oppressed the people and staged war exercises together with the U.S., far from opting for improving the south-north relations and standing for reunification.
					
					 They stressed they would conduct unflinching struggle so that the treacherous forces can not hold power again.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Accused of Challenging Nation
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Challenging Nation 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- All the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are bitterly denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for challenging them, far from making an apology to them for its high treason of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Wi Kwang Myong, officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, vehemently assailed the puppet military gangsters for blustering that they would not remove the photos and defamatory words from walls and doors of a unit. 
					
					 He said: Kim Kwan Jin, one of the masterminds of such hideous provocations against the DPRK, appeared on Yonphyong Island where he cried out for "punishing" the DPRK.
					
					 Now is the time to let those stupid men having no elementary concept of a war know what the genuine strike of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and a real war are like.
					
					 The human scum will never escape the retaliatory strikes of the army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Yun Thaek, department director of the General Bureau of Service for People, said the hatred of all the service personnel and people against the group of traitors hell-bent on reckless acts is running high. The army and people of the DPRK will wipe out the enemies through an indiscriminate sacred war and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, he declared.
					
					 Yun Kyong Sok, smelter of Steel Workshop No.1 of the Chollima Steel Complex, stated he and his co-workers could not pardon the villains for behaving more provocatively, far from making an apology for their thrice-cursed crimes but throw all of them into a furnace. 
					
					 Jo Kwang Song, a student of the graduating class of Pyongyang Jangsan Secondary school, said he was volunteering to join the Korean People's Army, determined to sternly punish rabid dog Lee Myung Bak. The world will clearly witness how terrible the sacred war to be waged by the DPRK is and what miserable end those lunatics shaking their fists towards the sky will meet, he added.

articles.title: Effigies of S. Korean Gentry Burnt
articles.content:
S. Korean Traitors Burnt in Effigy in the DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Burning of south Korea's Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo in effigy hit the screen on the Korean Central TV on Tuesday evening.
					 Its executers were teachers and students at Kim Chaek University of Technology, who were overpowered by rage at the hideous provocation the group of traitors committed against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The program enjoyed a great popularity among viewers.
					
					 It represented the surging indignation of the servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK, determined to unfailingly punish the traitors.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Hit for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Hit for Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo in a statement on March 8 denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This is a hysteric act of touching off resentment of all people, the statement said.
					 The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo expresses solidarity with the Korean people all out to protect the dignity of the supreme leadership of the country and declares that the members of the party are standing in the same trench with the Korean people, it noted.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Korean people and the heroic Korean People's Army would resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique against the DPRK and certainly achieve the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus and the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung released a joint statement on March 8 condemning the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for hurting  the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement fully supported the resolution of the Korean people to check the provocations of the south Korean puppet group and remove the root cause of a war from south Korea by mobilizing all means.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean regime stop war maneuvers and apologize to the Korean people.

articles.title: Casualties in Japan Caused by Great Quake and Tsunami
articles.content:
Casualties in Japan Caused by Great Quake and Tsunami
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The death toll caused by the great quake and tsunami that hit Japan one year ago is 15 854 up to this date. Those missing are 3 155. The National Police Agency of Japan released the figures on March 11, quoting a survey.

articles.title: Radioactivity Detected in 3 Spots in Fukushima
articles.content:
Radioactivity Detected in 3 Spots in Fukushima
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Plutonium-241 which was believed to have emitted from the crippled Fukushima nuclear power plant was detected in three places in Fukushima Prefecture 20-32 km northwest and south of the power station, said Tokyo Shimbun on March 9. This has raised concerns about the radioactive damage in Japan.

articles.title: Double Standards on Iran Rejected at IAEA Board of Governors
articles.content:
Double Standards on Iran Rejected at IAEA Board of Governors
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Cuban representative, addressing the Board of Governors of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) on Mar. 8, clarified his country's stand of categorically rejecting the application of double standards in dealing with the nuclear issue of Iran.
					 He accused some western countries of pulling up Iran over its nuclear issue despite the fact that it has conducted nuclear activities in line with its declaration submitted to the IAEA without seeking any military purpose.
					
					 On the contrary, those countries keep thousands of nuclear weapons and threaten other countries with them, while keeping silence over Israel's possession of nuclear weapons, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that Iran's nuclear issue cannot be settled with double standards, but only through dialogue and negotiations among the countries concerned without external interference on the basis of respect for international law.

articles.title: Iran, Turkey Condemn Israeli Attack on Gaza as "War Crimes"
articles.content:
Iran, Turkey Condemn Israeli Attack on Gaza as "War Crimes"
 Tehran, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Iranian Foreign Ministry on Sunday strongly condemned the Israeli air raids on the Gaza Strip as "war crimes". 
					 "The repeated assaults and aggressions of the Zionist regime's military men against the defenseless Palestinian people in Gaza... are condemned as war crimes and inhuman acts," the Foreign Ministry said in a statement.
					
					 "The international community and the human rights bodies are required not to keep mum about such flagrant violations of human rights and massacre of the defenseless Palestinian people by the Zionists but act upon their human and legal duty and responsibility for defending the Palestinian people." 
					
					 The Turkish Foreign Ministry said Saturday that Turkey strongly condemned Israel over its recent deadly air strikes on the Gaza Strip.
					
					 Turkey called on the world not to remain indifferent but to react to Israel's "disproportionate and indiscriminate retaliatory attacks" on Gaza, the ministry said in a statement.
					
					 The statement said that the current fighting could spiral out of control and benefit no one, demanding an immediate calm in the strip and urging Israel to end its inhumane and unacceptable policies toward Gaza."

articles.title: Egyptian FM Condemns Israeli Airstrikes
articles.content:
Egyptian FM Condemns Israeli Airstrikes
 Cairo, March 13 (KCNA) -- Egyptian Foreign Minister Mohamed Kamel Amr on March 10 scathingly condemned Israel for its indiscriminate airstrikes on Gaza Strip.
					 Expressing resentment at Israeli airstrikes, he said that the bloody killings of Arab brothers should be stopped at once.
					
					 The Egyptian government will make every possible effort to make Israel stop such atrocities, he stressed.

articles.title: Protest in U.S.
articles.content:
Protest in U.S. 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A protest was waged in Los Angeles, the U.S. on March 10.
					 Dozens of American women from "Women Occupy LA" demonstrated in front of Los Angeles City Hall. They demanded the authorities take a step for ensuring the rights of women, not a war and killing.

articles.title: Canada Condemns U.S. Killing of 16 Afghan Civilians
articles.content:
Canada Condemns U.S. Killing of 16 Afghan Civilians
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The killing of Afghan civilians by a U.S. soldier was "deplorable and runs contrary to everything that the international mission aims to accomplish," Canada's Defense Minister Peter MacKay said in a statement on Sunday.

articles.title: Indonesians Stand beside Iranians against Arrogant Powers: Minister
articles.content:
Indonesians Stand beside Iranians against Arrogant Powers: Minister
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Indonesian nation is committed to stand beside Iranian nation against world arrogant powers, Indonesian Minister for Religion Surya Darma Ali said on Friday. 
					 "Western states claim to be democratic and peace-seeking but they oppress other nations in practice," he said. 
					
					 The official noted that Iran's reaction to European states' decision to sanction Iranian oil and its firm position about cutting oil imports to the EU states show the country's commitment to resist hegemonic powers' illegal demands.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Calls for Enhancing Efficiency of Defence, Army Building
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Calls for Enhancing Efficiency of Defence, Army Building
 Beijing, March 13 (KCNA) -- Chinese President Hu Jintao Monday stressed the need to enhance efficiency of defence and army building.
					 Speaking at a plenary meeting of deputies of the Chinese People's Liberation Army to the Fifth Session of the 11th National People's Congress, he called on the whole army to display the spirit of fortitude, preserve the fine tradition of army building, save as much as possible and combat waste and thus steadily improve efficiency of defence and army building.
					
					 The local party committees and governments at all levels should take the military needs into account and continue paying attention to army building to provide a strong guarantee for defence and army building, he added.

articles.title: Israeli Airstrikes Kill More Palestinians
articles.content:
Israeli Airstrikes Kill More Palestinians
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Israeli airstrikes killed three innocent Palestinians and left five others wounded Monday in northern Gaza Strip.
					 Israel's military offensive in Gaza entered its fourth day on Monday, with death toll rising to 23. At least 70 others were wounded.

articles.title: Jordan Labels Israeli Aggression against Gaza "Barbaric"
articles.content:
Jordan Labels Israeli Aggression against Gaza "Barbaric"
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Jordan on Sunday condemned the Israeli aggression against the Gaza Strip as "barbaric".
					 The pretext that Israel uses to justify its attack against the Palestinians in the Gaza Strip has collapsed and no one believes it, Jordan's Minister of Communications and Media Affairs Rakan Majali said Sunday.
					
					 The minister said Jordan fully supports the Palestinians in Gaza warning the Israeli government against the continuation of the aggression.

articles.title: U.S. Unemployment Rate Increases
articles.content:
U.S. Unemployment Rate Increases
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The total number of unemployed Americans was virtually unchanged at 12.8 million in February, reported the Labor Department on Friday.
					 Many Americans have been jobless due to the economic and financial crises and wrong policies of the government.

articles.title: Highly Radioactive Substance Detected in U.S.
articles.content:
Highly Radioactive Substance Detected in U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Highly radioactive substance was recently detected in a place near Los Angeles, the U.S. where a nuclear installation once stood, sparking off furor.
					 The U.S. Environment Protection Agency said on March 8 radioactive cesium of about 7,300 Bq per 1 kg of soil, close to 1,000 times of tolerable level, was found in the site.

articles.title: Sri Lanka Strongly Reacts to U.S. Pressure
articles.content:
Sri Lanka Strongly Reacts to U.S. Pressure 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is becoming undisguised in its pressure upon Sri Lanka these days, making the situation complicated.
					 The U.S. said that the government forces of Sri Lanka abused the human rights of civilians at the final phase of their actions to terminate the civil war and branded it as war crimes.
					
					 And it was reported that the U.S. was wooing the UN Human Rights Council into adopting a resolution on putting pressure on the government of Sri Lanka.
					
					 Such moves are laying obstacles in the way of Sri Lanka which has just entered a new phase of development after putting an end to several decades of the civil war.
					
					 The issue of tribal dispute in Sri Lanka is a product of the Western colonialists' policy of national estrangement.
					
					 The U.S. was displeased with the development in Sri Lanka and mentioned only the so-called war crimes of its government forces during the civil war in the "country to country report on human rights in 2009".
					
					 Worse still, it blamed the president of Sri Lanka by calling his name and is working hard to put international pressure upon the country's government.
					
					 The government and people of Sri Lanka are, however, strongly reacting to the U.S. moves to bring again social discord and crisis of division to their country.
					
					 On February 27, massive protests took place against the U.S. sponsored resolution in various parts of Sri Lanka.
					
					 Government officials and a lot of people of different social strata in the protests strongly urged the U.S. to immediately roll back the illegal resolution and expressed their will to continue their anti-U.S. demonstrations till their demand is met.
					
					 The international community extends support to the people of Sri Lanka in their just struggle to foil the interference of the U.S. and achieve peace, stability and development of the country by their own efforts.

articles.title: Russia Condemns U.S. Soldier's "Inhumane" Shooting Rampage in Afghanistan
articles.content:
Russia Condemns U.S. Soldier's "Inhumane" Shooting Rampage in Afghanistan
						
 Moscow, March 13 (KCNA) -- Russia on Monday condemned the recent killing of Afghan civilians by a U.S. soldier.
					 Moscow was deeply shocked at the murders and denounced them as "inhumane acts" and "one of the gravest war crimes," said Konstantin Dolgov, the foreign ministry's commissioner for human rights, democracy and the rule of law.
					
					 "We expect those responsible will be severely punished and the command of the international forces will adopt efficient measures not to let similar accidents happen again in the future," Dolgov said.
					
					 At least 16 civilians, including women and children, were reportedly killed by the U.S. soldier, who walked out of his military base Sunday morning and opened fire at villagers in the southern Afghan province of Kandahar.

articles.title: Russia Takes Step to Boost Strategic Rocket Forces
articles.content:
Russia Takes Step to Boost Strategic Rocket Forces
 Moscow, March 13 (KCNA) -- Russia has taken a step to boost the strategic rocket forces.
					 The Novosibirsk missile combined unit will kick off rearming itself with PC-24 loaded with individual guided missile this year.
					
					 A spokesman for the Strategic Rocket Forces said this on March 12.

articles.title: Bird Flu Breaks Out in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Breaks Out in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Bird flu broke out in a farmhouse in Kyeryong City, South Chungchong Province on March 12, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 The dead chickens were confirmed positive for bird flu virus.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Birth Anniversary Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Birth Anniversary Formed in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed with due ceremony in Vladivostok, Russia on March 9.
					 At the inaugural ceremony Anatoli Dolgachev, chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Policy of Russia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse events including remembrance session, meeting and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Germany, Poland
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Germany, Poland
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Germany and Poland on March 3 and 8 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany praised the feats of Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and greatly contributed to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 He also praised the ideological and theoretical feats general secretary Kim Jong Il performed by formulating the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as an integral system of ideas, theories and methods of Juche and further developing it in depth.
					
					 He noted that the dear respected Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people's struggle to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Polish Association of Reserve Servicemen and other speakers said that the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung is a significant holiday of not only the Korean people but of all other people in the world who value peace and friendship.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people have dynamically advanced along the road chosen by themselves despite all ordeals and difficulties. This would have been unthinkable without the feats of the peerlessly great persons, they added.
					
					 They expressed firm conviction that the DPRK would open up a new avenue for an economic power and more strikingly demonstrate its might in the world arena this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de golpe conjunto del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de golpe conjunto del EPC
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, dirigio los ejercicios de golpe conjunto de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del EPC.
					  Para recibir al Comandante Supremo, estuvieron parados ante el mirador del campo de entrenamiento el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Jong Gak, primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk y Kim Won Hong.
					
					  Estaban en espera los generales de ejercito del EPC, Pak Jae Gyong, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol y Kim Yong Chol, los miembros del mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y los comandantes de las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC.
					
					  Presenciaron los ejercicios Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y Kim Chang Sop, los cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, los secretarios responsables de los comites del PTC en las provincias, los miembros del organo de direccion central del partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, asi como los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales y de los sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa, informacion e industria de defensa nacional.
					
					  Tras recibir el parte de recepcion del jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el Comandante Supremo subio al mirador.
					
					  Tras escuchar las explicaciones detalladas del programa de ejercicios y la ubicacion de las unidades de ataque, el dio la orden de iniciar los ejercicios.
					
					  Las escuadras de aviones, que descendian en picada, y los buques de las valientes fuerzas navales, que avanzaban levantando olas, comenzaron a disparar los proyectiles certeros como explosion de odio y revanchismo.
					
					  Mientras tanto, desde las posiciones de artilleria, que abrieron simultaneamente el fuego, se lanzaban sucesivamente las columnas de llama que dieron un golpe demoledor a la "flotilla de buques enemigos".
					
					  Kim Jong Un se mostro muy satisfecho del pilotaje intrepido e inteligente de los aviadores, que realizaban el vuelo a ras de la tierra, el ascenso brusco y giros de diferentes tipos, y elogio sus exitos en entrenamiento.
					
					 Seguidamente, presento las tareas importantes que serviran de guia en desarrollar el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					 Conscientes de su sagrada responsabilidad de defender la patria, los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del EPC deben mantenerse siempre en el maximo estado de alerta y vivir pensando siempre en el combate, indico.
					
					 En las armas de ellos esta reflejada la ferrea voluntad de controlar el fuego con el fuego y aniquilar sin piedad a los agresores que atenten contra la RPDC aunque en lo minimo, dijo y ordeno que exterminen implacablemente a los enemigos con los fusiles de justicia y venganza si estos dan algun movimiento sospechoso.
					
					 Senalando que el combate no se hace anunciandolo previamente y los enemigos estan acechando un ataque sorpresivo, el Comandante Supremo instruyo que todo el EPC debe defender con firmeza el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la patria socialista vigilando agudamente cada movimiento de los enemigos.
					
					 El regimen socialista a nuestro estilo centrado en las masas populares sera siempre baluarte inexpugnable porque lo defiende fidedignamente el heroico EPC, filas invictas de flor y nata fortalecidas bajo la guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, destaco.
					
					 Finalmente, Kim Jong Un expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los oficiales y soldados del EPC defenderan firmemente con armas la seguridad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.

articles.title: Militares y civiles denuncian actitud desafiante de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Militares y civiles denuncian actitud desafiante de banda de Lee Myung Bak 
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea continuan condenando categoricamente a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que asume una actitud mas provocativa en lugar de pedir disculpas por su tremendo crimen de haber insultado la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. 
					 El oficial del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, Wi Kwang Myong, se puso mas encolerizado al saber que los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano anunciaron que "no retirarian los retratos y frases de calumnia, colocados en una unidad militar surcoreana". 
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, uno de los autores principales del presente crimen, se presento en la isla Yonphyong y hablo de la supuesta "represalia", dijo Wi y continuo: 
					
					 Llego el momento de demostrar a esos tipejos, que no tienen el concepto de guerra, lo que es la guerra de verdad y el poderio real del fuego del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.
					
					 Contamos con medios y metodos de ataque mas poderosos y despiadados que no conoce ni puede imaginar el mundo. 
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos, que dejaron de ser humanos, no podran esquivar de ninguna manera el ataque de venganza de las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu. 
					
					 El jefe de departamento de la Direccion General de Servicios al Pueblo, Kim Yun Thaek, asevero que la locura de la banda de traidores surcoreanos puso al climax la hostilidad de todos los militares y civiles de la RPDC, y agrego que estos aniquilaran a los enemigos mediante la sagrada e indiscriminada guerra y cumpliran asi la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					 El fundidor del Taller de Acero no. 1 del Complejo de Acero Chollima, Yun Kyong Sok, dijo que meteria en el alto horno a los bribones surcoreanos que se muestran mas desafiantes lejos de disculparse por su horrendo crimen. 
					
					  El graduado de la Escuela Secundaria de Jangsan de Pyongyang, Jo Kwang Song, dijo que pidio alistamiento al Ejercito Popular de Corea con la decision de castigar severamente a Lee Myung Bak igual a un perro rabioso y enfatizo que el mundo vera claramente que terrible es la sagrada guerra de la RPDC y que tragico sera el fin de los psicopatas que insultaron al Sol.

articles.title: Prosiguen mitines de condena en sector agricola de RPDC
articles.content:
Prosiguen mitines de condena en sector agricola de RPDC
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tienen lugar en las unidades del dominio agricola de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea los mitines para exponer la decision de exterminar con la despiadada y sagrada guerra a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que insulto gravemente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					 En las ocasiones se dio lectura a la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea y hubo intervenciones.
					
					 Los oradores expresaron su creciente indignacion por el hecho de que el traidor Lee y sus compinches del circulo militar se muestran mas desafiantes en vez de pedir disculpas por sus tremendos actos provocativos.
					
					 El insulto a nuestra maxima dignidad significa un crimen antinacional e inmoral que no se puede expiar nunca, senalaron y prosiguieron:
					
					 No podemos perdonar nunca a la horda de gangsteres y belicistas surcoreanos que volvieron a cometer ese crimen.
					
					 La unidad monolitica de nuestro partido, ejercito y pueblo en torno a su lider constituye el verdadero aspecto de la Corea del Songun.
					
					 Todos los trabajadores agricolas, quienes consideran la defensa a ultranza al lider como su credo y maxima de vida, aumentaran la produccion de cereales con el animo de asestar un tremendo golpe a los enemigos y se movilizaran unanimemente en la justa y sagrada guerra si se les da la orden.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intencion de EE.UU. y Japon de agredir a RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intencion de EE.UU. y Japon de agredir a RPDC 
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos y Japon definieron la orientacion principal para reorganizar las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en Japon, cuyo contenido principal es mantener el cuerpo de marines en Okinawa con 10 mil efectivos. 
					 Segun esta orientacion, se priorizara el traslado de la infanteria de marina de EE.UU. en Okinawa a la isla Guam y se promovera paulatinamente el traslado en el mismo departamento del aeropuerto militar norteamericano en Futenma. 
					
					 EE.UU. intenta emplazar de modo rotativo en el Sur de Corea y otros paises asiaticos a los uniformados restantes de la infanteria de marina en Okinawa. 
					
					 Esto muestra que se pone en practica la estrategia norteamericana sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					 Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este miercoles y prosigue: 
					
					 EE.UU. pretende aumentar e intensificar su influencia en la citada region bajo la teoria de "Estado del Pacifico". 
					
					 Lo principal en su estrategia sobre Asia-Pacifico es tomar la hegemonia en el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					 Para ese fin, el imperio da importancia a la Peninsula Coreana porque solo cuando se apodere de esta peninsula asiatica podria lograr la hegemonia sobre el continente euroasiatico y el resto del mundo. 
					
					 Es por eso que concentra la fuerza en fortalecer la alianza militar con Japon, pais en el Nordeste Asiatico con abundantes experiencias de guerra de agresion, y su lacayo Sur de Corea. 
					
					 EE.UU. quiere tomar la isla Guam y Okinawa como puntos de apoyo para el cumplimiento de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana. Concentra las fuerzas armadas agresoras en las regiones cerca de la Peninsula Coreana para utilizarlas en la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					 E instiga a Japon en la grave crisis politica dando importancia al papel de ese pais isleno en el cumplimiento de la estrategia sobre Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					 EE.UU. pretende atacar a Corea tomando el Sur de Corea como punto de apoyo estrategico y militar y dominar con la fuerza la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					 La agravacion de la tension y el aumento de peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana agudizaran la tension y aumentaran el peligro de guerra en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
